name: Super Turrican 2
overview: Twice the Firepower. Twice the Burn. If you haven't played Super Turrican, chances are you won't last past the intro sequences here... As an intergalactic hero-wannabe commissioned to crush a venomous mutant armada, you are thrust into a chaotic world even more violent than the original. This time there are more enemies to torch (and be torched by) - including the most heinous level bosses on 16-bit - and enough Mode 7 graphic levels to make you wish mommy were there to hold your hand. But she'll be busy cleaning up your charred carcass.
